Contribute to early stage Blockchain startups

Now everyone can access the presale token fundraising opportunities.

our mission:

Inclusive early stage fundraising platform

PresalePro aims to increase an ICO’s return on investment through its “Members Only” platform for ICO presales, by linking visionary and anticipative investors with promising Blockchain-related start-ups.

WATCH VIDEO

How does the platform work?

  • Benefit 1

    In creating an early-bird Blockchain start-up investment system, PresalePro is able to increase an investment's safety, Return on investment (ROI), and the likelihood of a fruitful ICO.

  • Benefit 2

    PresalePro aims to increase an ICO’s return on investment through its “Members Only” platform for ICO presales, by linking visionary and anticipative investors with promising Blockchain-related start - ups.

  • Benefit 3

    PresalePro’s model is therefore based on a unique blend of business and commercially proven methodologies.
